content.rendered:
POWERED BY
KNOWLEDGE

LOCAL EXPERTS USING
THE LATEST TECHNIQUES
& TECHNOLOGY.

ABOUT US

OPERATING SINCE 1990

DRIVEN BY SAFETY
PREMIUM CAR WASH

BOOK A SERVICE

OPERATING SINCE 1990

Vaucluse Auto Repairs has been in the same spot since 1990, repairing, restoring, modifying, maintaining and servicing vehicles in the local community.

EXPERT TECHNICIANS

We employ only the best mechanical and electrical technicians, so you can rest assured your vehicle repairs are carried out to the highest standard.

COURTESY VEHICLES

Where possible, we offer our customers a complimentary loan car where possible, as well as pickup and drop off services within the local area.

QUALITY CUSTOMER SERVICE

We keep you updated throughout the repair process, with courtesy calls and transparent pricing. In addition, we offer free wash and clean with every service.

Rego pink slips & blue slips

More info

More info

Log Book

More info

POWERED BY KNOWLEDGE.
WE PROVIDE A PERSONALISED
PREMIUM SERVICE.

BUY & SELL
Our Experts

At VAR Automotive we realise that your car is a key part of your family’s life and lifestyle. we will make sure that your vehicle is performing at its peak, delivering the reliability that you expect.

ALL WORK GUARANTEED
ONE STOP SHOP EUROPEAN & PRESTIGE VEHICLE SERVICE CENTRE

Registration Inspections

Mechanical Repairs

Diagnostics

New Vehicle Services

Car Washing
